keyMoments.title: Sanji's Furious Battle
keyMoments.description: Sanji demonstrates his fighting prowess and protective nature in his battle against Absalom, revealing his childhood dream in the process.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the depth of Sanji's character and his dedication to protecting his crewmates.

keyMoments.title: Luffy's Tactical Victory
keyMoments.description: Luffy successfully lands his first solid hit on Warlord Gecko Moria using creative tactics to bypass Doppelman.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's captain's growth in tactical combat thinking.

keyMoments.title: Usopp Confronts the Ghost Princess
keyMoments.description: Usopp catches up to Perona and prepares for their confrontation, showing his bravery in pursuing a dangerous opponent.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up one of Usopp's most memorable battles in the series.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

name.japanese: スリラーバーク四怪人

keyMoments.title: Absalom Overwhelmed by Sanji
keyMoments.description: Absalom, one of the Mysterious Four, is beaten by Sanji after having 'stolen' his childhood dream of the Clear-Clear Fruit.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that the Mysterious Four members are being defeated one by one by the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Moria's Shadow Tactics
keyMoments.description: Gecko Moria uses his Doppelman to fight Luffy, demonstrating the strategic use of his shadow abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Moria's combat style and his reliance on his Devil Fruit powers.

keyMoments.title: Perona's Ghost Princess Declaration
keyMoments.description: Perona reveals herself as the Ghost Princess and threatens to eliminate all the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Perona's role as a major antagonist in the arc.

ships.description: Massive island-sized ship that serves as Gecko Moria's mobile base
